alert.note: Alert for Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 2:10PM MDT until June 20 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BIG HORN AND SOUTHERN ROSEBUD COUNTIES... At 210 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Lodge Grass, or 33 miles north of Sheridan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Busby, Kirby and Rosebud Battlefield Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
